talents.info_text:
Use an adjacent friend or foe as a springboard, vaulting over them to another tile within range.

This maneuver grants you a burst of speed from your momentum, allowing you run 63%, 77%, 90%, 101%, 112% faster (movement speed bonus) in the same direction you vaulted for 3 turns.

The increased speed ends if you change directions or stop moving.
talents.name: Vault

talents.info_text:
Move to a spot within range, bounding around, over, or through any enemies in the way.

This maneuver can surprise your foes and improves your tactical position, improving your physical critical chance by 2%, 4%, 6%, 7%, 9% for 1 turn.
talents.name: Tumble

talents.info_text:
While this talent is sustained, you anticipate deadly attacks against you.

Any time you would lose more than 37%, 30%, 26%, 23%, 21% of your life in a single hit, you instead duck out of the way and assume a defensive posture.

This reduces the triggering damage and all further damage in the same turn by 12%, 20%, 26%, 30%, 33%.

You need 31.2 Stamina and an adjacent open tile to perform this feat (though it does not cause you to move).
talents.name: Trained Reactions

talents.info_text:
You gain greater facility with your acrobatic moves, lowering the cooldowns of Vault, Tumble, and Trained Reactions by 1, 3, 4, 5, 5, and their stamina costs by 3.9, 6.9, 8.8, 10, 11.

At Rank 3 you also gain 10% global speed for 1 turn after Trained Reactions activates. At rank 5 this speed bonus improves to 20% and lasts for 2 turns.
talents.name: Superb Agility

name: Acrobatics
description: For light footed Rogues who prefer flight to fighting fair!

talents.info_text: Shoot your bow, sling or other missile launcher!
talents.name: Shoot

name: archery - base
description: Ability to shoot.

talents.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using bows.

Also, increases your reload rate by 0, 1, 2, 2, 3.
talents.name: Bow Mastery

talents.info_text: You fire an arrow that cuts right through anything, piercing multiple targets if possible with nigh infinite armor penetration, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage.
talents.name: Piercing Arrow

talents.info_text:
You fire two arrows at your target, hitting it and a nearby foe if possible, doing 155%, 170%, 181%, 191%, 199% damage

This talent does not use any stamina.
talents.name: Dual Arrows

talents.info_text: You fire multiple arrows at an area of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 radius, doing 95%, 110%, 121%, 131%, 139% damage with each arrow.
talents.name: Volley of Arrows

name: archery - bows
description: Specialized bow techniques.

talents.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using slings.

Also, increases your reload rate by 0, 1, 1, 2, 3.
talents.name: Sling Mastery

talents.info_text:
You fire a shot into your target's eyes, blinding it for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns and doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage.

The blind chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Eye Shot

talents.info_text:
You fire a mighty shot at your target, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage and knocking it back.

The knockback chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Inertial Shot

talents.info_text: You fire an average of 3.0, 3.7, 4.1, 4.3, 4.5 shots at your target, doing 50%, 58%, 65%, 70%, 75% damage with each shot.
talents.name: Multishot

name: archery - slings
description: Specialized sling techniques.

talents.info_text:
Your reflexes are lightning-fast, if you spot a projectile (arrow, shot, spell, …) you can instantly shoot at it without taking a turn to take it down.

You can shoot down up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 projectiles.
talents.name: Shoot Down

talents.info_text:
You rush toward your foe, readying your shot. If you reach the enemy, you release the shot, imbuing it with great power.

The shot does 216%, 243%, 264%, 282%, 298% weapon damage and knocks back your target by 4, 6, 7, 8, 8.
talents.name: Bull Shot

talents.info_text:
Activating this talent enhances your reflexes to incredible levels. Each time you are attacked in melee, you have a 14%, 31%, 37%, 40%, 42% chance get a defensive shot off in time to intercept the attack, fully disrupting it (including extra blows from certain talents), dealing 65%, 76%, 84%, 90%, 97% archery damage, and knocking the attacker back 1, 1, 2, 3, 3 tiles.

Activating this talent will not interrupt reloading.
talents.name: Intuitive Shots

talents.info_text:
You fire a shot at your target's throat, mouth, or equivalent body part, doing 130%, 147%, 160%, 171%, 181% damage and silencing it for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The silence chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Strangling Shot

name: archery excellence
description: Specialized archery techniques that result from honed training.

talents.info_text:
You fire a burning shot, doing 85%, 100%, 111%, 121%, 129% fire damage to the target and lighting up the area around the target in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 3, 3.

At level 3, it also has a chance to blind for 3 turns.
talents.name: Flare

talents.info_text:
You fire a crippling shot, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage and reducing your target's speed by 19%, 39%, 40%, 40%, 40% for 7 turns.

The status power and status hit chance improve with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Crippling Shot

talents.info_text:
You fire a pinning shot, doing 120%, 128%, 135%, 140%, 145% damage and pinning your target to the ground for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns.

The pinning chance increases with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Pinning Shot

talents.info_text:
You fire multiple shots in a circular pattern with radius 1, 1, 2, 2, 3, doing 100%, 122%, 138%, 151%, 164% damage and stunning everyone hit for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The stun chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Scatter Shot

name: archery prowess
description: Specialized archery techniques to maim your targets.

talents.info_text: A steady shot, doing 166%, 189%, 207%, 222%, 235% damage.
talents.name: Steady Shot

talents.info_text:
You enter a calm, focused stance, increasing your Physical Power (+29, +40, +48, +54, +61), Accuracy (+29, +40, +48, +54, +61), Armour penetration (+28, +39, +47, +53, +60), and critical chance (+32%, +43%, +51%, +57%, +64%), but reducing your firing speed by 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%.

The effects will increase with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Aim

talents.info_text: You switch to a fluid and fast battle stance, increasing your firing speed by 13%, 27%, 40%, 51%, 62% at the cost of your Accuracy (-11, -14, -17, -20, -22), Physical Power (-11, -14, -17, -20, -22), and critical chance (-11%, -15%, -17%, -20%, -22%).
talents.name: Rapid Shot

talents.info_text:
You fire a shot without putting much strength into it, doing 80%, 93%, 102%, 111%, 118% damage.

That brief moment of relief allows you to regain 22, 32, 43, 53, 64 stamina.
talents.name: Relaxed Shot

name: archery training
description: Generic archery techniques.

talents.info_text:
Concentrate on your blows; each strike has a 46%, 54%, 58%, 61%, 63% chance to deal another, similar, blow for 5, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

This works for all blows, even ones from other talents and from shield bashes.

The chance increases with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Greater Weapon Focus

talents.info_text:
After killing a foe, you have a 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100% chance to gain a 1000% movement speed bonus for 1 game turn.

The bonus disappears as soon as any action other than moving is done.

Note: since you will be moving very fast, game turns will pass very slowly.
talents.name: Step Up

talents.info_text:
Lashes at the target, doing 135%, 150%, 161%, 171%, 179% weapon damage.

If the attack hits, the target will bleed for 261%, 286%, 305%, 322%, 336% weapon damage over 7 turns, and all healing will be reduced by 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56%.
talents.name: Bleeding Edge

talents.info_text:
Take a defensive stance to resist the onslaught of your foes.

While wounded, you gain all damage resistance equal to 27%, 34%, 40%, 45%, 50% of your missing health.

(So if you have lost 70% of your life, you gain 19%, 24%, 28%, 32%, 35% all resistance.)

In addition, your all damage resistance cap increases 19%, 34%, 44%, 51%, 57% closer to 100%.

This consumes stamina rapidly (-12, -9, -7, -5, -4 stamina/turn).

The effects are refreshed at the start of each turn.
talents.name: True Grit

name: battle tactics
description: Advanced combat tactics.

talents.info_text: Shout your warcry in a frontal cone of radius 4, 5, 7, 8, 9. Any targets caught inside will be confused for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Warshout

talents.info_text:
You enter an aggressive battle rage, increasing Accuracy by 22, 30, 35, 40, 44 and Physical Power by 22, 30, 35, 40, 44 and making you nearly unstoppable, granting 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56% stun and pinning resistance.

Sustaining this rage takes its toll on your body, decreasing your life by 2% each turn, but for every 1% of life missing you gain 0.5% critical hit chance.

Even when sustained, this talent is only active when foes are in sight.

The Accuracy bonus increases with your Dexterity, and the Physical Power bonus with your Strength.
talents.name: Berserker Rage

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 110%, 123%, 132%, 141%, 148% damage. If the attack hits, the target's armour and saves are reduced by 6, 13, 20, 25, 31 for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

Also if the target is protected by a temporary damage shield there is 34%, 70%, 80%, 85%, 88% chance to shatter it.

Armor reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Shattering Blow

talents.info_text:
Search your inner strength for a surge of power.

For 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns you gain 4, 9, 16, 20, 25 stamina per turn and 12%, 20%, 25%, 30%, 34% movement and attack speed.

Only usable at 30% or lower stamina.

Stamina regeneration is based on your Constitution stat.
talents.name: Relentless Fury

name: berserker's strength
description: Fear nothing!

talents.info_text:
Your mighty blows inspire utter terror on your foes. Any melee strike you do that deals more than 41%, 32%, 27%, 24%, 22% of the target's total life puts them in a mortal terror, dazing them for 5 turns.

Your critical strike chance also increase by 2%, 5%, 8%, 11%, 14%.

The daze chance increase with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Mortal Terror

talents.info_text:
Delight in spilling the blood of your foes. After scoring a critical hit, your maximum hit points will be increased by 2%, 5%, 8%, 10%, 12%, your life regeneration by 2.07, 3.34, 4.30, 5.12, 5.84 per turn, and your stamina regeneration by 0.41, 0.67, 0.86, 1.02, 1.17 per turn for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

The life and stamina regeneration will stack up to five times, for a maximum of 10, 17, 22, 26, 29 and 2.07, 3.34, 4.30, 5.12, 5.84 each turn, respectively.
talents.name: Bloodbath
Bloody Butcher
talents.info_text:
You delight in the inflicting of wounds, providing 20, 26, 31, 35, 38 physical power.

In addition when you make a creature bleed its physical damage resistance is reduced by 13%, 24%, 33%, 41%, 47% (but never below 0%).

Physical power depends on your Strength stat.

You enter a battle frenzy for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns. During that time, you can not use items, healing has no effect, and your health cannot drop below 1.

At the end of the frenzy, you regain 4%, 10%, 14%, 17%, 20% of your health per foe slain during the frenzy.

While Unstoppable is active, Berserker Rage critical bonus is disabled as you lose the thrill of the risk of death.
talents.name: Unstoppable

name: bloodthirst
description: Delight in the act of battle and the spilling of blood.

talents.info_text:
Allows shields to be equipped, using Cunning instead of strength as a requirement.

When you are attacked in melee, you have a 19%, 21%, 23%, 25%, 26% chance to deflect the attack with your shield, completely evading it.

The chance to deflect increases with your Cunning.
talents.name: Buckler Expertise

talents.info_text: Bash an enemy in melee range with your shield (twice for talent level 5 or more), doing 150%, 172%, 188%, 201%, 214% damage and knocking them back 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 squares. You may then follow with a deadly short-range sling attack, dealing 226%, 258%, 282%, 302%, 321% damage. The shield bash will use Dexterity instead of Strength for the shield's bonus damage.
talents.name: Bash and Smash

talents.info_text: When you are hit by a projectile, physical or otherwise, you have a 10%, 22%, 31%, 38%, 44% chance to deflect it up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 squares away. At talent level 5, your Bash and Smash shield hit is a guaranteed critical.
talents.name: Buckler Mastery

talents.info_text: Any time you block an attack with Buckler Expertise or Buckler Mastery you instantly counterattack with your sling for 24%, 39%, 51%, 61%, 70% damage This can only occur up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 time(s) per turn.
talents.name: Counter Shot

name: Buckler Training
description: Mastery over their shields separates Skirmishers from Archers, and gives them an edge.

talents.info_text:
Rushes toward your target with incredible speed. If the target is reached, you get a free attack doing 120% weapon damage.

If the attack hits, the target is dazed for 3 turns.

You must rush from at least 2 tiles away.
talents.name: Rush

talents.info_text:
You focus your strikes, reducing your attack speed by 10% and increasing your Accuracy by 20, 27, 33, 37, 41 and critical chance by 9%, 15%, 20%, 24%, 28%.

The effects will increase with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Precise Strikes

talents.info_text: You have learned to focus your blows to hit your target, granting +45, +66, +85, +102, +118 accuracy and allowing you to attack creatures you cannot see without penalty for the next 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.
talents.name: Perfect Strike

talents.info_text: Through rigorous training, you have learned to focus your actions for a short while, increasing your speed by 16%, 27%, 37%, 46%, 54% for 5 turns.
talents.name: Blinding Speed

name: combat techniques
description: Generic combat oriented techniques.

talents.info_text: Your skin becomes more resilient to damage. Increases resistance to all damage by 4.0%, 7.2%, 10%, 13%, 15%.
talents.name: Thick Skin

talents.info_text:
You become better at using your armour to deflect blows and protect your vital areas. Increases Armour value by 2, 5, 8, 10, 13, Armour hardiness by 18%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56%, and reduces chance to be critically hit by 5%, 10%, 15%, 19%, 23%, assuming heavy mail armour.

(This talent only provides bonuses for heavy mail or massive plate armour.)

At level 1, it allows you to wear heavy mail armour, gauntlets, helms, and heavy boots.

At level 2, it allows you to wear shields.

At level 3, it allows you to wear massive plate armour.
talents.name: Armour Training

talents.info_text: Increases the accuracy of unarmed, melee and ranged weapons by 14, 29, 41, 51, 60.
talents.name: Combat Accuracy

talents.info_text: Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65, and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using swords, axes or maces.
talents.name: Weapons Mastery

talents.info_text: Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65, and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using daggers.
talents.name: Dagger Mastery

talents.info_text: Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65, and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using exotic weapons.
talents.name: Exotic Weapons Mastery

name: combat training
description: Teaches to use various armours, weapons and improves health.

talents.info_text: Your combat focus allows you to regenerate stamina faster (+0.8, +1.4, +2.0, +2.6, +3.1 stamina/turn).
talents.name: Quick Recovery
Fast Metabolism
talents.info_text: Your combat focus allows you to regenerate life faster (+3.4, +5.0, +6.4, +7.7, +8.9 life/turn).
Rigorous training allows you to be more resistant to some spell effects (+11, +23, +35, +46, +58 spell save).
talents.name: Spell Shield

talents.info_text: You revel in the death of your foes, regaining 6.7, 12, 17, 21, 24 stamina with each death you cause.
talents.name: Unending Frenzy

name: combat veteran
description: Generic combat oriented techniques.

talents.info_text:
You recover faster from poisons, diseases and wounds, reducing the duration of all such effects by 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56%.

Additionally, when your life falls below 50%, you heal for a base 19, 22, 24, 26, 27 health plus 1.0%, 1.5%, 1.8%, 2.0%, 2.2% of your maximum life (currently 20, 23, 26, 28, 29 total) each turn for 8 turns. This effect can only happen once every 15 turns.

The base healing scales with your Constitution.
talents.name: Vitality

talents.info_text:
You've learned to recover quickly from effects that would disable you. Each turn, you have a 27%, 43%, 51%, 56%, 59% chance to recover from a single stun effect.

At talent level 2 you may also recover from blindness, at level 3 confusion, level 4 pins, and level 5 slows and wounds.

Only one effect may be recovered from each turn, and the chance to recover from an effect scales with your Constitution.
talents.name: Unflinching Resolve

talents.info_text:
Enemies are intimidated by how composed you remain under fire. When you take more then 5% of your maximum life in a single hit, all enemies in a radius of 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 will be intimidated, reducing their Physical Power, Mindpower, and Spellpower by 22, 30, 37, 42, 47 for 4 turns.

If your health drops below 41, 32, 27, 24, 22, you'll be unable to maintain your daunting presence, and the sustain will deactivate.

The power of the intimidation effect improves with your Physical power, and it's chance to affect your enemies improves with your Strength.
talents.name: Daunting Presence

talents.info_text:
You release a surge of adrenaline that increases your Physical Power by 11, 14, 17, 19, 21 for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. While the effect is active, you may continue to fight beyond the point of exhaustion.

Your stamina based sustains will not be disabled if your stamina reaches zero, and you may continue to use stamina based talents while at zero stamina at the cost of life.

The Physical Power increase will scale with your Constitution.

Using this talent does not take a turn.
talents.name: Adrenaline Surge

name: conditioning
description: Physical conditioning.

talents.info_text:
Attack with your offhand weapon for 110%, 127%, 140%, 151%, 161% damage. If the attack hits, the target is stunned for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns, and you hit it with your mainhand weapon doing 110%, 127%, 140%, 151%, 161% damage.

The stun chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Dual Strike

talents.info_text: Lashes out with a flurry of blows, hitting your target three times with each weapon for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% damage.
talents.name: Flurry

talents.info_text:
Attack your foes in a frontal arc, doing 135%, 150%, 161%, 171%, 179% weapon damage and making your targets bleed for 0 each turn for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The bleed damage increases with your main hand weapon damage and Dexterity.
talents.name: Sweep

talents.info_text: Spin around, damaging all targets around you with both weapons for 155%, 170%, 181%, 191%, 199% weapon damage.
talents.name: Whirlwind

name: dual techniques
description: Specialized dual wielding techniques.

talents.info_text: Increases the damage of your off-hand weapon to 68%, 77%, 82%, 85%, 87%.
talents.name: Dual Weapon Training

talents.info_text:
You have learned to block incoming blows with your weapons. When dual wielding, your defense is increased by 25, 34, 40, 46, 51.

The Defense bonus scales with your Dexterity. At talent levels higher than 5, you may parry melee attacks with your offhand weapon (except mindstars).

(You currently have a 0%, 0%, 0%, 3%, 23% chance to deflect up to 0 damage (0%, 0%, 0%, 0%, 15% of your offhand weapon damage) from approximately 0.0, 0.6, 1.3, 1.8, 2.2 melee attacks (based on your Cunning) each turn.)
talents.name: Dual Weapon Defense

talents.info_text:
You have learned to hit the right spot, increasing your armor penetration by 11, 16, 21, 25, 29 when dual wielding.

The Armour penetration bonus will increase with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Precision

talents.info_text: When dual wielding, increases attack speed by 13%, 23%, 32%, 41%, 48%, but drains stamina quickly (-6 stamina/turn).
talents.name: Momentum

name: dual weapons
description: Specialized dual wielding techniques.

talents.info_text: Jump away 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 grids from your target.
talents.name: Disengage

talents.info_text:
Sense foes around you in a radius of 30, 41, 49, 55, 62 for 4, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns.

The radius will increase with your Cunning.
talents.name: Track

talents.info_text:
A mighty kick that pushes your target away 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 grids.

If another creature is in the way, it will also be pushed away.

The Knockback chance increase with your Accuracy or your Physical Power, whichever is greater.
talents.name: Heave

talents.info_text: Your great dexterity allows you to see incoming projectiles (spells, arrows, …), effectively slowing them down by 28%, 41%, 54%, 67%, 80%.
talents.name: Slow Motion

name: field control
description: Control the battlefield using various techniques.

talents.info_text:
A finishing uppercut that deals 145%, 160%, 171%, 181%, 189% damage, and attempts to stun your target for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 to 4, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, depending on the amount of combo points you've accumulated.

The stun chance will improve with your Physical Power.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
talents.name: Uppercut

talents.info_text:
A powerful concussive punch that deals 105%, 124%, 139%, 151%, 162% weapon damage to your target. If the punch hits, all targets in a radius of 1 will take 39, 50, 59, 66, 72 to 193, 251, 294, 330, 361 damage, depending on the amount of combo points you've accumulated.

The area damage will scale with your Strength, and the radius will increase by 1 per combo point.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
talents.name: Concussive Punch

talents.info_text:
You spin into a flying leap and deliver a powerful kick dealing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage to all enemies in a radius of 1 as you land. The range will increase by 1 per combo point and total damage will increase by 10% per combo point.

Using this talent removes your combo points and you must have at least 1 combo point to use it.
talents.name: Butterfly Kick

talents.info_text:
A vicious finishing strike that deals 211%, 249%, 278%, 303%, 325% damage increased by 20% per combo point you have up to a max of 423%, 499%, 557%, 607%, 650%. If the target ends up with low enough life (<20%), it might be instantly killed.

Killing a target with Haymaker will instantly restore 3%, 7%, 10%, 12%, 15% to 14%, 16%, 18%, 20%, 21% of your maximum stamina, depending on the amount of combo points you've accumulated.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
talents.name: Haymaker

name: finishing moves
description: Finishing moves that use combo points and may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.

talents.info_text:
Make a melee attack for 100% damage and then attempt to grapple a target up to one size category larger then yourself for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. A grappled opponent will be unable to move, take 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 damage each turn, and 7%, 14%, 20%, 25%, 30% of the damage you receive from any source will be redirected to them. Any movement from the target or you will break the grapple. Maintaining a grapple drains 6 stamina per turn.

You may only grapple a single target at a time, and using any targeted unarmed talent on a target that you're not grappling will break the grapple.
talents.name: Clinch

talents.info_text:
Enhances your grapples with additional effects. All additional effects will apply to every grapple with no additional save or resist check.

Talent Level 1: Reduces base weapon damage by 9, 12, 14, 17, 18

Talent Level 3: Silences

Talent Level 5: Reduces global action speed by 0%, 0%, 0%, 65%, 72%
talents.name: Crushing Hold

talents.info_text:
Rushes forward and attempts to take the target to the ground, making a melee attack for 55%, 74%, 89%, 101%, 112% damage then attempting to grapple them. If you're already grappling the target you'll instead slam them into the ground creating a radius 5 shockwave for 277, 376, 452, 517, 575 physical damage and breaking your grapple.

The grapple effects and duration will be based off your grapple talent, if you have it, and the damage will scale with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Take Down

talents.info_text: In a mighty show of strength you whirl your grappled victim around and throw them into the air causing 227%, 280%, 320%, 354%, 385% damage to them and any nearby enemies they collide with on landing.
talents.name: Hurricane Throw

name: grappling
description: Grappling techniques that may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.

talents.info_text:
A nasty bite that hits for 135%, 150%, 161%, 171%, 179% weapon damage, reduces the targets healing by 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56%, and causes the target to bleed for 226%, 258%, 282%, 302%, 321% weapon damage over 5 turns.

Only usable while frenzied.
talents.name: Frenzied Bite

talents.info_text:
Leaps toward a target within range.

Only usable while frenzied.
talents.name: Frenzied Leap

talents.info_text:
Bites the target for 75%, 86%, 94%, 100%, 107% weapon damage, potentially causing it to bleed for 115%, 130%, 141%, 151%, 159% weapon damage over five turns.

If the target is affected by the bleed it will send the devourer into a frenzy for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns (which in turn will frenzy other nearby devourers).

The frenzy will increase global speed by 24%, 29%, 33%, 36%, 38%, physical crit chance by 24%, 29%, 33%, 36%, 38%, and prevent death until -24%, -29%, -33%, -36%, -38% life.
talents.message: @Source@ tries to bite @Target@ with razor sharp teeth!
talents.name: Gnashing Teeth

name: horror techniques
description: Physical talents of the various horrors of the world.

talents.info_text:
Allows you to use a melee weapon to focus your spells, granting a 44%, 57%, 65%, 70%, 74% chance per melee attack to deliver a Flame, Lightning or Earthen Missiles spell as a free action on the target.

When using a shield the chance is reduced by one fourth.

When dual wielding or using a shield the chance is halved for each weapon.

Delivering the spell this way will not trigger a spell cooldown, but only works if the spell is not cooling down.

The chance increases with your Cunning.
talents.name: Arcane Combat

talents.info_text: The user gains a bonus to Spellpower equal to 21%, 28%, 35%, 40%, 46% of their Cunning.
talents.name: Arcane Cunning

talents.info_text: Regenerates 0.20, 0.40, 0.58, 0.74, 0.89 mana per turn, and increases physical and spell critical chance by 3%, 6%, 8%, 11%, 13% while active.
talents.name: Arcane Feed

talents.info_text:
Raw magical damage channels through the caster's weapon, increasing Physical Power by 20, 42, 59, 73, 85.

Each time you crit with a melee blow, you will unleash a radius 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 ball of either fire, lightning or arcane damage, doing 109, 148, 187, 226, 265.

The bonus scales with your Spellpower and talent level.

If you are using a shield this will only occur 75% of the time.

If you are dual wielding this will only occur 50% of the time.

At level 5 the ball becomes radius 2.
talents.name: Arcane Destruction

name: magical combat
description: The blending together of magic and melee prowess.

talents.info_text: You hit your target, doing 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% damage, distracting it while you jump back 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 squares away.
talents.name: Hack'n'Back
